short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kreava extension allows you to quickly find and view search results directly from address bar & new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make Chrome your own with our personalised extension

Clean and crisp or quirky and creative, with Kreava, you can upload your own backgrounds to Chrome and make your start page as unique as you

Simply download and install Kreava and you can benefit from the Microsoft Bing search engine delivering  the best quality images, videos, news and search

Download now and customise your Chrome browser with just a few easy steps :
 
Install Kreava on your chrome browser
Open a new tab or window
On the right of the time, click on settings
Click on register here in the bottom right 
Create your own username and password
Hit on go back, then login using the details you created
Then press UPLOAD image , add a caption and away you go!

Installing this extension will update your search settings provider to the Bing search engine.

EULA - https://www.kreava.com/eula
Privacy - https://www.kreava.com/privacy-policy
